<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Conflagration Club](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1051)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 182 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A ring of magical crystals encircles the base of this _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22)_, allowing it to absorb and store magical energy.

<document level="2" id="action-841" />

</column>
